import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Counter from './Counter' import Faq from './Faq' import Features from './Features' import Matrix from './Matrix' import logo_banner from '../../assets/img/logo_banner.png' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; function LandingMian(props) { const propslang = props.location && props.location.state useEffect(() => { document.title = "XTRON" }, []); const [lang, setLang] = useState(propslang === "Spanish" ? "Spanish" : "English") const history = useHistory(); const navigateTo = (url) => { history.push({ pathname: url, state: lang }) } return ( <> {/* */}

{lang === 'English' ? "Contract address" : "Direccion del contrato"} : {process.env.REACT_APP_CONTRACT_ADDRESS}

{lang === 'English' ? "THE FIRST INTELLIGENT CONTRACT" : "EL PRIMER CONTRATO INTELIGENTE"}

) } export default LandingMian
